StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: CIDS_REINDEX_ALL
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE UIM_DI01.CIDS_REINDEX_ALL
IS
CURSOR c1 IS SELECT id FROM cs_class;
CURSOR c2 IS SELECT id FROM cs_class where indexed = '1';
BEGIN
FOR r IN c1 LOOP
reindexpure_class(r.id);
END LOOP;

FOR r IN c2 LOOP
reindexderivedobjects(r.id);
END LOOP;
END;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE UIM_DI01.CIDS_REINDEX_ALL
IS
CURSOR c1 IS SELECT id FROM cs_class;
CURSOR c2 IS SELECT id FROM cs_class where indexed = '1';
BEGIN
FOR r IN c1 LOOP
reindexpure_class(r.id);
END LOOP;

FOR r IN c2 LOOP
reindexderivedobjects(r.id);
END LOOP;
END;
